rows.label: tlk45370151_05_msg0001
rows.name: Please leave the Emperor to us.

rows.label: tlk45370151_05_msg0002
rows.name:
I and the Royal Guard are
prepared to face the worst.

rows.label: tlk45370151_05_msg0003
rows.name:
Even if we are beset by the Divine Beasts
themselves, we will protect
His Majesty at any cost.

rows.label: tlk45370151_05_msg0004
rows.name:
In return, I can only ask that you do
everything in your power to overcome
the trials that face you.
